meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the genitalia.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the patient's genitalic area for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent2: Proper hygiene is important for maintaining good genitalic health.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the awkwardness of discussing genitalic issues in public.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork depicted flowers in vibrant colors, resembling the beauty of genitalic diversity.
meanings.sent5: The textbook had detailed illustrations of various genitalic structures for study.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the reproductive organs.
meanings.sent1: The scientist conducted research on the effects of certain substances on genitalic functions.
meanings.sent2: Animals have different genitalic systems for reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The movie plot revolved around a futuristic society where genitalic enhancements were common.
meanings.sent4: The music festival was a celebration of life, echoing the rhythms of genitalic vitality.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artwork depicted gods with exaggerated genitalic features symbolizing fertility.

meanings.definition: A term used to describe the external reproductive organs.
meanings.sent1: The biologist studied the evolution of various animal genitalic structures.
meanings.sent2: Insects have unique genitalic configurations for mating purposes.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled when they learned the scientific names of their genitalic parts.
meanings.sent4: The landscape was dotted with flowers resembling delicate genitalic sculptures.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased intricate models of different animal genitalic organs.
